functions.title: BOE Vol 14
pages:
§lFire Aspect I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a piece of Magma Cream as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL  
 B 
 R §r

§lFire Aspect II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a laval bucket as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
 R §r

§lFlame:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a fire charge as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL  
 B 
 R §r

§lFrost Walker I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a block of blue ice as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL  
 B 
 R §r

§lFrost Walker II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two blocks of blue ice as the reagents (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
R R§r
